channel.title: tidy-tuesday on ravic_
channel.description: Recent content in tidy-tuesday on ravic_

item.title: Tidy: Potential fraud in Guess My Word
item.description: Like others, I’ve been surprised by my own addiction to Ryan Jones’s revival of “Guess My Word”. I’ve been particularly interested in the identification of suspiciously quick answers ("🍀 lucky?). Let’s dig in.

item.title: Tidy: Spotify songs
item.description: From #tidy-tuesday, this week we have a rich dataset from Spotify. Let’s dig in!
